resources.string: The purpose of providing us your email is to let you login along with your password, or resetting your password if you had forgotten, or receive extra helpful notifications from us!\n*Please make sure the email is a valid and can receive emails.
Setup a strong password and don\'t forget it

The password must comply with:
1. 8 to 20 characters
2. At least one uppercase letter
3. At least one lower case letter
4. At least a digit
5. At least a special character (Eg: !,@,#,$,_)
Provide a name so that the others can recognize you! Maximum 30 characters.
